body_html: I love the idea of improving the landing page. I know that it's not super fancy, but the rorganize.it app sort of tries to onboard people a bit. I'm not saying we have exactly the same thing, but just to give some inspiration.

body: I love the idea of improving the landing page. I know that it's not super fancy, but the rorganize.it app sort of tries to onboard people a bit. I'm not saying we have exactly the same thing, but just to give some inspiration.
